title: Pi√±ata Hecarim Skin!!!
body: Like what? That sounds so cool! really nice idea. Just an idea I had and I thought: Why hasn't anybody thought of this? I haven't heard of it, and it's such a cool concept. Of course his scythe would be the piñata hitting stick. I don't know, his ult could throw some candy as a vfx. I really haven't created or drawn any concept... but still, it sounds pretty cool. {{champion:120}}
